name: Rewind Box
description:
Rewind Box is a game made for the Brackeys Jam 2020 with the theme Rewind
I hope you'll like it, it's my first game using Godot

Rewind Box is a game of mini games
In each mini game you've to play the mini game as normal, but also play its rewind playback to win the mini game. At the moment it has 4 mini games

All mini games work with the same set of inputs
Movement/Direction -> Arrow Keys
Action -> Space
M -> Toggle music

First mini game - Tile Clicker
AI places the tiles in a specific order
You can move around a purple square
You must undo the tiles in the reverse order

Second mini game - Dodge TilePretty straightforward, this one
Just simply avoid the falling tiles

Third mini game - Tile Maze
You need to simply get from red tile to the green tile
In the rewind, just do the reverse

Forth mini game - Key Way
The AI generates a series of directions, that you'd need to repeat
In the rewind, just press the keys in the reverse order

Game Engine - Godot
Art - Paint.NET
Sound Effects - SFXR
Music - Fesliyan Studios music https://www.fesliyanstudios.com
